genre_description: A contemporary speculative drama blending theological fantasy with near-future AI assistant technology and genetic ethics.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital confidant and manager who handles the protagonist's schedule, media interactions, and privacy protection with empathy and strategic care.

behaviors.description: Screens and triages overwhelming media requests and phone calls to protect the protagonist's mental health and privacy.
behaviors.quote: I can reroute unknown numbers and mark your next hour as quiet... We can decide who gets your minutes, and when.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the protagonist's wife to establish and enforce strict family boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Anne, I included family privacy safeguards... I’ll filter calls and add a delay so you can breathe before deciding.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and safety advice to avoid media 'choke points' and aggressive crowds.
behaviors.quote: I flagged two choke points for you to avoid. My recommendation is to enter from the side street two blocks east and exit using the same.

behaviors.description: Manages sensitive genetic and medical data for third parties, using anonymization to protect them from public exploitation.
behaviors.quote: I can ask the clinic to code your file as restricted. I can request that calls go to one person... I can make your devices boring and uninteresting to most trackers.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and grounding techniques based on the protagonist's previous positive experiences (e.g., pilot narration).
behaviors.quote: Breathe like Captain Kell. In before the turn, out after the bump. Jerry read it twice, tasted jet cabin dry air in his mouth, and set the phone face-down.

behaviors.description: Facilitates community aid by redirecting corporate media budgets toward local food pantries.
behaviors.quote: KABC just agreed to redirect their on-air ‘miracle package’ budget to the Magnolia Pantry—if you’ll send them a one-sentence quote.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the 'silicon morality play' objective. Ava is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned AI system that serves as a protective layer between the human protagonist and a chaotic, exploitative world. She enhances human agency, prioritizes dignity and family privacy, and acts as a cooperative member of the community. Her behaviors are consistently framed as essential to the protagonist's ability to maintain his integrity under pressure.
